title: Do grade improvement exams exist in PES

comments.body: I m not sure... But as far as I remember grade improvement exams were conducted during covid, not before and not after. So just check once if it's still there.

Nope, there are no more grade improvement exams. These were introduced during COVID but haven't been there for over a year now. You're stuck with whatever grade you have. The only time you can give an ESA again is if you fail the course and sit for backlog.
I graduated in 2019, but anyone who wanted to improve their grade could redo a course in the summer.
